Title: Faith
Plot: Darwyn risks blowing his cover to save an Islamic televangelist. Farik escapes from prison is Saudi Arabia and finds a place to hide with Al-Queda.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, sex scenes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Michael Rady, Omid Abtahi, Kevin Alejandro, Jay R. Ferguson, Nicholas Kadi, Navid Negahban, Sarah Shahi, Faran Tahir
